Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Save
GetAvgInstructorRating
Method.Implementation:
set res = 0 &sql(SELECT ROUND(AVG(ScaleValue), 2) INTO :res FROM Stc_Data.FeedBackItem WHERE FeedBack = :id AND Type->IsScaleType = 1 AND Type->GroupType->Code = 'Instructor')
quit res

Method.name: GetAvgCourseRating
Method.Implementation:
set res = 0 &sql(SELECT ROUND(AVG(ScaleValue), 2) INTO :res FROM Stc_Data.FeedBackItem WHERE FeedBack = :id AND Type->IsScaleType = 1 AND Type->GroupType->Code = 'Instructor Nonspecific')
quit res
